alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and southwestern Echols Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout and gusty winds near Jasper, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings and Crossroads. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
